location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bowyear, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, James Morley, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter makes the argument against moving the factory to Carrack [Kharg Island]. Gives consent to the plan to leave Bushire should Carim Caun [Karim Khan] not meet the Company's demands.
